attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2019-0744

Date: 2019-06-09

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the remuneration and certain conditions of employment, in the amount and on the date indicated in the annexed schedule, of:

 

Barone, Salvatore (Sam), former Member and acting Chairperson of the Canadian Transportation Agency, within the range GCQ 9 ($265,900 - $312,800), effective February 12, 2015, within the range GCQ 9 ($269,300 - $316,800), effective April 1, 2015. In addition, the remuneration shall be adjusted in accordance with any increases approved for the GCQ 9 salary range;

 

Caron, Gaétan, former Member and Chairman of the National Energy Board, within the range GCQ 9 ($265,900 - $312,800), effective April 1, 2014. In addition, the remuneration shall be adjusted in accordance with any increases approved for the GCQ 9 salary range;

Ebbs, Catherine, former Chairperson of the Public Service Labour Relations Board, within the range GCQ 7 ($201,400 - $236,900), effective July 2, 2014. In addition, the remuneration shall be adjusted in accordance with any increases approved for the GCQ 7 salary range;

Sur recommandation du premier ministre, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil fixe la rémunération et certaines conditions d’emploi, conformément au montant et à la date indiqués dans l’annexe ci-jointe, de :

 

Barone, Salvatore (Sam), ancien membre et président par intérim de l’Office des transports du Canada, dans l’échelle GCQ 9 (265 900 $ – 312 800 $), à compter du 12 février 2015, dans l’échelle GCQ 9 (269 300 $ – 316 800 $), à compter du 1er avril 2015. De plus, la rémunération sera ajustée conformément à toute augmentation approuvée pour l’échelle salariale GCQ 9;
